text: Pick a random object near you. Pretend it’s the main character of a Netflix show. What’s the plot?
Put on music. Dance for 1 minute like you’re trying to confuse a security camera.
Walk around your room and give a fake tour in a British accent.
Text someone ‘The frog has escaped. You know what to do.’ Say nothing else.
Wear your socks on your hands and narrate your next task like a puppet show.
Sit outside and write down 5 things happening in the world around you. Pretend you're describing it to an alien.
Write a haiku about your current mood. Doesn’t have to be deep, just honest.
Lie down and imagine you're 80 years old. What tiny thing from today do you think you’d remember?
What’s a song lyric or phrase that keeps coming back to you lately? Why do you think it sticks?
Write a short list: 3 people, 3 memories, 3 songs. No explanation. Just the first that come to mind.
Take a photo of something mundane and make it look dramatic. Frame it like art.
Record a voice note like you’re the narrator of a true crime documentary about your own day.
Invent a new emotion. Describe what it feels like, when it shows up, and what it looks like.
Design a product nobody needs but everyone would want. Bonus: name it.
Draw your current mental state as a weather map. Include a forecast.
Send a random nice message to someone you haven’t spoken to in months. No context. Just kindness.
Ask a friend: what’s something weird they loved as a kid? Compare answers.
Make a fake gift for someone using only objects in your room. Text them a photo of it.
Send a friend a 5-second voice note describing your mood using only sound effects.
Scroll through your camera roll, find a random photo, and text the person in it a compliment or memory.
Walk in a random direction for 5 minutes. Take a photo of the most interesting thing you see.
Google a country you've never thought about. Find one fun fact. That’s your vibe of the day.
Set a 3-minute timer. Write down as many fake startup ideas as you can.
Pick one object you own. Imagine it’s secretly alive. What’s its backstory?
Assign RPG stats to yourself today (Strength, Charisma, etc). Be brutally honest.
Blind sketch challenge: Pick one object nearby and draw it without looking. No peeking. Picasso would be proud.
Eat one snack with your non-dominant hand. Pretend your dominant hand retired.
Send someone a completely undeserved, dramatic compliment. Make them blush or cringe. No in-between.
Put on a song. Dance like you're trying to impress a squirrel.
Write a fake Yelp review for your bed.
